node.title: 'I don't accept anybody's red lines': Biden and Putin to talk about Ukraine in video call
node.alt: A Ukrainian soldier holds a cat and walks in a trench.
node.description: USÂ President Joe Biden and Russian President Vladimir Putin they will hold a video call on Tuesday, with the two leaders set to discuss the tense situation in Ukraine.
node.content:
["US\u00a0President Joe Biden and Russian President Vladimir Putin have said they will hold a video call on Tuesday, with the two leaders set to discuss the tense situation in Ukraine.", "\"[President]\u00a0Biden will underscore US\u00a0concerns with Russian military activities on the border with Ukraine and reaffirm the United States's support for the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine,\" White House spokesperson Jen Psaki said in a statement.", "She said other topics would include \"strategic stability, cyber and regional issues\".", "The two will also talk about bilateral ties and the implementation of agreements reached at their Geneva summit in June, the Kremlin said on Saturday.", "\"The conversation will indeed take place on Tuesday,\" Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said.", "\"Bilateral relations, of course, Ukraine and the realisation of the agreements reached in Geneva are the main [items]\u00a0on the agenda,\" he said.", "The exact timing of the call was not disclosed.", "More than 94,000 Russian troops are believed to be massed near Ukraine's border. Ukraine Defence Minister Oleksii Reznikov said on Friday\u00a0that Moscow might\u00a0be planning a large-scale military offensive for the end of January, citing intelligence reports.", "US\u00a0officials have come to similar conclusions, they said.", "
'I don't accept anybody's red lines'
", "", "
US President Joe Biden told reporters\u00a0he expected to have a \"long discussion\" with Russian President Vladimir\u00a0Putin.(AP)
", "Mr Biden, meanwhile, has rejected Russian demands for security guarantees in the region.", "\"I don't accept anybody's red lines,\" he said.", "The US President said he and his advisers were preparing a comprehensive set of initiatives aimed at deterring the Russians\u00a0from an invasion.", "He did not give further details, but the administration has discussed partnering with European allies to impose more sanctions on Russia.", "US\u00a0Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin separately said that Washington was committed to ensuring that Ukraine had what it needed to protect its territory.", "Mr Austin added that there was a lot of space for diplomacy and leadership to work in Ukraine.", "Moscow accuses Kyiv of pursuing its own military build-up. It has dismissed as inflammatory suggestions that it is preparing for an attack on its southern neighbour and has defended its right to deploy troops on its own territory as it sees fit.", "US\u00a0officials say they do not know yet what Mr Putin's intentions are, including whether Mr Putin has made a decision to invade Ukraine.", "For years, US-Russia relations have been deteriorating, notably with Russia's 2014 annexation of Crimea from Ukraine, its 2015 intervention in Syria and US\u00a0intelligence charges of meddling in the 2016 election won by now-former president Donald Trump.", "", "
US-Russia relations have been deteriorating for years.(Reuters:\u00a0Kevin Lamarque/Alexei Nikolsky)
", "However, relations\u00a0have become more volatile in recent months.", "The Biden administration has asked Moscow to crack down on ransomware and cyber crime attacks emanating from Russian soil.", "In November, a Ukraine national and a Russian were charged in relation to one of the worst ransomware attacks against American targets.", "Russia has repeatedly denied carrying out or tolerating cyber attacks.", "The two leaders have had one face-to-face meeting since Mr Biden took office in January, sitting down for talks in Geneva in June.", "They last talked by phone on July 9. Mr Biden relishes direct talks with world leaders, seeing them as a way to lower tensions.", "US\u00a0Secretary of State Antony Blinken warned Russian Foreign Minister\u00a0Sergei Lavrov in Stockholm earlier this week that the United States and its European allies would impose \"severe costs and consequences on Russia if it takes further aggressive action against Ukraine\".", "Reuters"]
